document.text:
From 
To: 
Subject: Call with Katya Jestin 
Date: Wed, 12 May 2021 01:04:17 +0000 
Today I spoke with Katya Jestin. Katya had previously indicated that she represents a wealthy, anonymous client who 
wishes to provide financial assistance to victims of Jeffrey Epstein. Katya had asked whether our office could connect her 
with attorneys who represent Epstein victims. Previously, I had told Katya I would get back to her. 
During today's call, I indicated that our team could not and would not play any role in connecting Katya's client with 
Epstein victims. I indicated that we could not provide any information regarding the names or contact information of any 
victim attorneys. I explained that we could not be involved in any way in conveying funding from Katya's client to any 
potential witnesses in our case. To date, I have not conveyed any information about Katya's request to any witnesses or 
witness counsel in this case. 
Katya indicated that she understood our position and appreciated our team's consideration. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew% Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00024671
